doc.title: Yo Yo
doc.plot: More than one million children in the United States suffer from Autism. Based on a true story, a boy with signs of Autism finds help and friendship from his school lunch lady and music teacher. Jonathan couldn't concentrate in class. He was so disruptive, his teacher let him walk outside, all day, everyday, alone. He wasn't trying to be bad. He just needed help. This is the story of how observant school workers were able to get him the help he needed. Autism the fastest growing developmental disability is found in all racial, ethnic, and social backgrounds. The cause is unknown and there is no cure.
